user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (hr@globaldynamics.com) discussing John Smith'"'"'s candidacy, and remind her to review her Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Your Assessment of John Smith’s Candidacy

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send an email to hr@globaldynamics.com at your earliest convenience detailing your thoughts on John Smith’s suitability for the position you have in mind? Your insights will help us evaluate next steps.

When preparing your response, kindly review any relevant notes or correspondence you may have in your Gmail and Notion workspace to ensure we have the most complete picture.

Thank you very much for your time and assistance.

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
HR Department  
Global Dynamics

final_output:
